attributes.action: Make road tax the same for all road users. A seperate fee for immisions.
attributes.additional_details: In too many cases the people with low immisions car uses the road more often then the petrol heads who most times only uses their in summer. These rules should be looked at.
attributes.background: Am a member of the armed forces watching the country dive into hole where soon enough the government won't have funs to repair roads.
